hero.headline: YouTube Evergreen Content Guide
hero.subheadline: Create once, earn views forever. The power of timeless content.

sections.content: Evergreen content keeps generating views months and years after upload. Unlike news or trend content that spikes and dies, evergreen videos build passive traffic. Your best evergreen videos can become assets that work for you indefinitely.

faq.question: Should all content be evergreen?
faq.answer: No—mix is best. Trending content can drive subscribers who then watch evergreen. Both have roles in growth strategy.

faq.question: How to make tutorials evergreen?
faq.answer: Focus on principles over specific tool versions. Update when major changes happen. Use 'Updated 2025' in title if refreshed.

faq.question: Do evergreen videos need promotion?
faq.answer: Less than trending—they're designed for search. But initial push helps. Share, embed, link. Search picks up over time.

faq.question: How often update evergreen content?
faq.answer: When information becomes outdated or performance drops. Annual review for 'year' videos. Some true evergreen needs no updates.
